column2: U.S. Bancorp unit settles lawsuit over role as trusteeU.S. Bancorp unit settles lawsuit over role as trustee NEW YORK U.S. Bank has agreed to pay $6 million to settle an investor lawsuit that accused the U.S. Bancorp unit of violating its duties as a trustee for mortgage-backed securities that were sold by Bear Stearns before the 2008 financial crisis. column2: Xerox to sell IT outsourcing arm to France's Atos for $1.05 bln Dec 18 Xerox Corp said it agreed to sell its IT outsourcing (ITO) arm to French IT services firm Atos SE  for $1.05 billion.
